SELECT O.ORDER_NO , O.ORDER_DATE , MEMBER_ID , SB_NAME , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DETAIL_ORDER DEO2 WHERE DEO2.ORDER_NO = O.ORDER_NO) ORDER_AMOUNT , O.ORDER_AMOUNT_MONEY FROM TBL_ORDER O JOIN DETAIL_ORDER DEO ON (O.ORDER_NO = DEO.ORDER_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) JOIN SHOPPINGBASCKET USING (SB_NO)
